explains: v. 使扩大；使变宽，拓宽；扩展；拉大（差距）（widen的现在分词）

sentences.en: Increased traffic necessitated widening the road.
sentences.cn: 交通量增大，这就需要拓宽道路。

sentences.en: The class differences in child-rearing are growing—a symptom of widening inequality with far-reaching consequences.
sentences.cn: 在抚养孩子方面的阶级差异正在扩大——这是不平等扩大的一个表现，具有深远的影响。

sentences.en: Wage differences in the two areas are widening.
sentences.cn: 两个地区之间的工资差距正在拉大。
